Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2010 05:48PM Ann8103 wrote: My tumor markers continued to climb to over 3200 during the past year.  Been through lots of different chemos.  Now on Gemzar/Carboplatin and they've dropped within 6 weeks to 204!   The number itself isn't as significant as the rate of change.  Sometimes it takes a while to hit on the right chemo that will do  the job.  I'm Stage IV...mets to liver.  Just had PET/CT and the 5 tumors that we outside the liver seem to be gone.  I'm hoping Gemzar/Carbo is my ticket for a long while. Ann
Posts.Title: Tumor markers WAY up BonnieVA tami444
